ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds carrots, peeled and sliced diagonally into 1/2-inch pieces
2 tablespoons bourbon, or more to taste

cookingTips: Cut carrots evenly on the diagonal so they cook uniformly
Toss carrots well with the glaze mixture before roasting to ensure even coating
Roast at 375°F for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through, until carrots are tender and caramelized
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple but elegant side dish. Do you prefer your carrots softer or with some firmness? That will affect the roasting time.
